column4: Lucid Window Controls vanish on LOGIN.  I reinstalled the metacity packages with synaptic.  No fix.  I have to go to Appearances and re-enable Visual Effects but that only works until next login.  Any ideas?
pretty strange, I don't have a sound card i this PC, I plugged in a Logitech usb headset, viola! Sound works, skype works (even with the mic), so it must be issues with native sound boards huh.
yeah, i've got great sound but had to change settings for my headset.  NOW i have to reconfigure to get speakers back
wow, like they just don't want to play nice together.
